attributes.action: Make tackling the Climate Crisis the UK Parliament's Highest Priority
attributes.background: On Wednesday 1st May MPs approved a motion to declare an environment and climate emergency. However, there hasn't been any action since. We are calling on Parliament to commit to making tackling the Climate Crisis their highest priority.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261048
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259051
